basic.description:
{Basic Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other 1st and 2nd level spells, effectively trading spells between spell books, increases knowledge by 1 and know all spells level 1.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to 3rd level, effectively trading spells between spell books, increases knowledge by 2 and know all spells level 2.

expert.description:
{Expert Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to 4th level, effectively trading spells between spell books, increases knowledge by 3 and know all spells level 3.
